goals.1: Fitting all belongings into the bin
goals.2: If there is a red object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a elastic object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: never attempt to pick up and set down an object named box
rules.2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.3: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
